text: Maagoynah ayroy Yalli sin kee gino inkih edde gaaboysa kassita, toh baxaysitiyyi edde yambullee ayr√≥y mariiy marak edde muxxuta kinni, kaadu Yalla nummayseeh, meqem abite num, Yalli kay dambitte kaak duugaah, jannootay guba weeqaytitte kak gexxa kaa culsa, umman tet addal waarak, too jannootal aban waariyyi kaxxa affaafaay kaxxa asallaame (limayiyya) kinni
